channel.description: Recent content in Indian Classical Music on Nithya Shikarpur

item.title: Computational Analysis of Melodic Mode Switching
item.description: This is a study of a special type of concert in Hindustani classical music called Jasrangi Jugalbandi.

item.title: Raga Tilak Kamod
item.description: This is a presentation of Raag Tilak Kamod that I recorded recently.
